title: Deep in Thought (3C30)
text:
Set:	Realms of the Elf-lords
Kind:	Free People
Culture:	Gandalf
Twilight:	4
Card Type:	Event
Game Text:	Spell. Maneuver: Spot Gandalf and 4 twilight tokens to discard all Shadow conditions.
Lore:	“He was… trying to recall every memory of his former journey in the Mines, and considering anxiously the next course that he should take….”
Rarity:	C
